q: Please don't give me a hard time
qna.a: It's not like I asked you to marry me or what

q: You just occasionally wanna have coffee or lunch somtimes
qna.a: I hope we can get back together again

q: How could you cheat on me for that long
qna.a: I must admit, I've crossed the line

q: I'd like to put my car on the market
qna.a: Are you sure? What's the deal

q: We don't need two cars anymore
qna.a: What if you have the car, and I have to go shopping

q: We need to cut back on shopping
qna.a: Honey, I think you should just calm down a little bit
